title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: " On Thursday the 12th February 1818," I now quote from a manuscript of the Rev. Mr. Fraser, minister of Kilchrennan, " Dr. Chalmers preached in the Tron Church before the Directors  of the Magdalene Asylum. The sermon delivered on this occasion was that ' On the Dissipation of Large Cities.'
